properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 3:33PM EST until February 14 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...

Appomattox River At Mattoax affecting Amelia...Chesterfield and
Powhatan Counties

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia..

Nottoway River At Sebrell affecting Southampton County


For the Appomattox Basin...including Mattoax...Minor flooding is
occurring and is expected to continue.For the Chowan Basin...
including Sebrell...Minor flooding is forecast.

The Flood Warning continues for...
The Nottoway River At Sebrell
* from Tuesday morning to late Thursday night...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 03:15 PM Monday the stage was 15.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 16.6 feet by
Wednesday morning. The river will fall below flood stage Thursday
before midnight.
* At 18.5 feet...Hancock Peanut Mill is affected in Courtland.
This river level is comparable to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on
May 24 2018.
